short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between SE/DK site when browsing an IKEA product on ikea.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An aid to help you decide whether to buy an IKEA product in Sweden or Denmark by allowing you to easily switch between the two sites to compare prices. 

Instructions: Go to the Swedish or Danish IKEA site and browse to a product. While on the product page, right click on the page, and choose "Switch SE/DK", and you will be taken to the same page, but for the other country.


Please note that this extension is not in any way affiliated with IKEA.
